root.name: Chex Quest 2
root.description: Overview After the success of the original Chex Quest, which was given away on a CD packed inside of specially marked boxes of Chex breakfast cereal, a sequel was developed. Based on The Ultimate Doom, though far less violent, you must guide the Chex Warrior in his quest to save Chex City from the dastardly Flemoids. Chex Quest 2 is available as a download on Charles Jacobi' s personal website, which includes all 3 Chex Quest games. External Links Chucktropolis - Charles Jacobi's personal website, with Chex Quest download link

similar_games.game: Sonny's Race for the Chocolatey Taste
